content.html: A social contract in multi-tiered orgs WRT influence and decision making. If you are not performing the work, you cannot interfere how it is performed. You can set an outcome of the work. You can not obstruct "how". If you want to change "how" you need to roll up your sleeves.
content.value:
A social contract in multi-tiered orgs WRT influence and decision making.

If you are not performing the work, you cannot interfere how it is performed.

You can set an outcome of the work.
You can not obstruct "how".

If you want to change "how" you need to roll up your sleeves.
